Text:
Hi. I've never had an issue with iSerial until last month when it wouldn't allow me to run the reader. I just tried this one for April and I get the same "Runtime error." The failure message reads: "Can't find plugin method ExtStr(x As Extinteger) As String"

Any ideas? Thanks in advance and thanks for all the great torrents!

Sorrry rjc1138 that you had this problem,

But I've never heard of this run time error occurring.  Will the iReader runl without the database? Maybe it got corrupted.

I would re-download the whole thing again and retry...

Hi Polisdavid,
Any chance you could also seed Bookends. I'm trying to download and am still very stuck. Thanks for this serialbox too.
Cheers.
